text:
Hello,

I am attempting to set up a membership registration page. The frontend components are functioning correctly, except for the disabled email field. When I add JavaScript code to remove the disabled attribute from the email field, an error message appears stating "Please enter an email address." Can someone provide assistance?

The provided URL appears to lead to the registration page: <https://figoo.co/_hcms/mem/register>

Thank you.
For self registration is there anyway to capture first and last name as well?
